slides.title: Shoulder shrugs
slides.des:
Gently lift your shoulders.
 Let them slowly fall.
 You should feel tension being released as your shoulders drop.

slides.title: Shoulders
slides.des: Move your head from right to left and from left to right. Do this for 30 seconds!

slides.title: Neck rotations
slides.des:
Keep your head upright.
 Gently turn your head from side to side.
 As you turn your head, try to move it past your shoulder.

slides.title: Back and forward bend
slides.des: Gently bend your head back and forward.

slides.title: Head rotations
slides.des: Gentrly rotate your head from side to side.

slides.title: Leg stretches
slides.des: Stretch your Legs. Do this 30 seconds per side.
